thread.title: Why Biogen Needs a Growth Spurt
thread.title_full: Why Biogen Needs a Growth Spurt - WSJ

author: Charley Grant
title: Why Biogen Needs a Growth Spurt
text:
Cost-cutting and stock buybacks can only get Biogen so far. To reverse the sharp slide in its stock, the company needs to jump-start growth.
Biogen on Wednesday reported third-quarter revenue of $2.8 billion and adjusted earnings per share of $4.48. Both topped analyst estimates and the latter was helped along by share repurchases. The biotech company also raised its full-year earnings guidance, in part due to its announcement that...
